attributes.action: have the speed limit displayed on enforcement cameras
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A recurrent complaint regarding speed cameras is that limits may change over time and over the length of a road, and that drivers may miss a signed change of limit.  We the undersigned call on the Prime Minister to amend the legislation on fixed speed cameras to include placing a speed limit repeater on the front and rear of fixed cameras, or, in the case of average speed cameras, a repeater on the pole or gantry supporting the camera.
